articles.title: Russia Sends North Korea's Nukes Signal to US Allies
articles.description: Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov has backed North Korea's nuclear program and warned Washington against teaming up with regional Asian allies against Moscow and Pyongyang, following military drills between the U.S., Japan, and South Korea.

articles.title: Unsold Homes Surge Nationwide As Housing Market Stalls
articles.description: Thousands of unsold homes are piling up in the U.S. housing market as Americans face climbing prices, historically high mortgage rates, and growing economic uncertainty, leading to a significant decline in pending sales.

articles.title: Biden Will Issue a Pardon of His Son Hunter Biden
articles.description: President Joe Biden has decided to issue a pardon for his son Hunter, expected to be announced Sunday night, marking a reversal from his previous stance of not using executive authority to pardon his son or commute his sentence.
